article_title: What's Wrong With Our Health Care Safety Net?

article_metadata.author: John C. Goodman

og.description: California expects to enroll 2.6 million additional low-income families in its Medicaid program this year. But here’s a surprise:  an even greater number of people who were previously on Medicaid may not renew. That’s right. The total number of people with Medicaid coverage may actually go down. Both changes are [...]
